name: The Smurfs
summary: The Smurfs is a 3D platform game for the PlayStation, developed by Doki Denki Studio and released by Infogrames in 1999 exclusively in North America. A Nintendo 64 version (The Smurfs 64) was scheduled for release but was ultimately cancelled.
info:
• 中文名: 蓝精灵
  • 平台: PlayStation
  • 发行日期: 1999年12月14日
